help.mission: Your mission is to guess the country of the day using the data provided by your attempts
help.input: Enter any country in the input by typing its name
help.attempt: Analyze the attempt, the colors identify how close you are to discovering the correct country
help.map: Consult the world map at any time
help.author: Made by

language.title: Language
language.description: Select the best language for you

coastline.name: Coastline
coastline.description: Does the country have a coastline?

forfeit.text: Are you sure that you want to give up?
